data.name: TRIPP
data.description:
TRIPP is the essential app for Mood on Demand. 
 
Winner of Gamesbeat 2024 Game Changers award and Time’s Best Invention of 2022.

Just put on your VR headset, download TRIPP, and select FREE Demo to get started.

When you subscribe to TRIPP, you can access 100+ fully immersive meditation experiences that make it easy to let go of outside distractions and racing thoughts as you escape into stunning landscapes and virtual worlds.  
Follow along with your guide’s soothing voice, and different breathing exercises, and earn streak rewards to stay in the present moment and let the peace and calm wash over you.

TRIPP members get access to regularly updated content:

DAILY FOCUS AND CALM MEDITATIONS in awe-inspiring worlds and landscapes

MIXED REALITY GIFTS to encourage you to stick with your meditation routine

GUIDED BREATHING EXERCISES use our new AI-powered technology so you can control the movements of the world with your own breath

SLEEP EXPERIENCES to help you drift into deep restful sleep with an extensive catalog

PERSONALIZED EXPERIENCES using your own photos and custom elements

MULTI-DAY CHALLENGES to build mindfulness skills and support your well-being

FREE TRIPP MOBILE APP to track your progress and access content on the go

PLUS so much more

Transform You. Transform the World Around You.
